method.name: POST
method.doc: To import a certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: kdb
param.doc: The certificate database file to be imported.

param.name: stash
param.doc: The stash file to be imported.

response.doc: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
